sentence.Network_en: Diplomats meeting in Chile have laid the groundwork for far-reaching environmental regulations.
sentence.Network_cn: 在智利会面的外交官们已经为那些对未来影响深远的环境保护条例的制定打好了基础。

sentence.Network_en: Yesterday's meeting was to lay the groundwork for the task ahead.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天的会议是为以后的工作做准备。

sentence.Network_en: These courses provide the groundwork of statistical theory.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些课程介绍的是统计学理论的基础。

list.abs: the biggest challenge of survey and alignment is the soft groundwork and the tight positioning requirement for Shanghai Synchrotron Radiation Facility .上海光源在准直测量方案设计中面临的最大挑战来自于松软地基及高精度的定位要求。
a preliminary groundwork must be laid this year .今年要打好初步基础。

entry.def: The groundwork for something is the early work on it which forms the basis for further work.

example.ex: Yesterday's meeting was to lay the groundwork for the task ahead...
example.tran: 昨天的会议是为以后的工作做准备。

example.ex: These courses provide the groundwork of statistical theory.
example.tran: 这些课程介绍的是统计学理论的基础。

means.word_mean: 1. the fundamental assumptions from which something is begun or developed or calculated or explained;

sentences.sentence: "the whole argument rested on a basis of conjecture"
"it was built on a base of solid rock"
"he stood at the foot of the tower"

means.word_mean: 3. preliminary preparation as a basis or foundation;

sentences.sentence: "we are prepared today because of groundwork that was done ten years ago"

auth_sentence.content: Beta-amyloid is thought to lay the groundwork for dementia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Beta-amyloid is thought to lay the groundwork for dementia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Beta-amyloid is thought to lay the groundwork for dementia.

auth_sentence.content: A case of laying the groundwork for the real negotiations.
auth_sentence.res_content: A case of laying the groundwork for the real negotiations.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A case of laying the groundwork for the real negotiations.

auth_sentence.content: Berggruen has also been laying the groundwork for a project in Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content: Berggruen has also been laying the groundwork for a project in Europe.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Berggruen has also been laying the groundwork for a project in Europe.

Sentence.sentence: Increasingly, science indicates that genes lay the groundwork for many human traits.

sentences.en: A preliminary groundwork must be laid this year.
The first meeting laid the groundwork for the final agreement.
sentences.cn: 第一次会议为最终的协定奠定了基础。

sentences.en: We are already doing the groundwork for the introduction of the scheme next year.
sentences.cn: 我们已经在为明年施行计划做些基本的准备工作。
